document.docAuthor: Molina, Óscar S. & Gil-Azevedo, Leonardo H.
document.masterDocTitle: Simulium (Trichodagmia) (Diptera, Simuliidae) phylogeny revisited: the Neotropical and Afrotropical connection

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Simulium (Trichodagmia) (Diptera, Simuliidae) phylogeny revisited: the Neotropical and Afrotropical connection

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Instituto Oswaldo Cruz - IOC / Fiocruz, Laboratório de Simulídeos e Oncocercose (LSO / IOC- Fiocruz), Coleção de Simulídeos do IOC - CSIOC / Fiocruz, Referência Nacional em Simulídeos, Oncocercose e Mansonelose, Av. Brazil, 4.365, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil.
Departamento de Entomologia. Museu Nacional-Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro, Quinta da Boa Vista s / n, 20940 - 040, São Cristóvão, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil.

bibRefCitation.author: Crosskey R. W.
bibRefCitation.refString: Crosskey R. W. 1969. A re-classification of the Simuliidae (Diptera) of Africa and its islands. Bulletin of the British Museum (Natural History). Entomology. Supplement 14: 1 - 195. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / p. 78201

subSubSection.paragraph:
Freemanellum Crosskey, 1969: 92 , figs 91, 110–112, 131, 147, 163, 205–206, 254 (as subgenus). Type species:
Simulium berghei Fain, 1949
.

bibRefCitation.author: Fain A.
bibRefCitation.refString: Fain A. 1949. Simulies du Kivu (Congo Belge). Revue de zoologie et de botanique africaines 42: 295 - 298.

bibRefCitation.author: Fain A. & Elsen P.
bibRefCitation.refString: Fain A. & Elsen P. 1980. Notes sur les simulies du Mayumbe (Zaire) avec description de deux especes et une sous-espece nouvelles (Diptera, Simuliidae). Revue de zoologie et de botanique africaines 94: 811 - 840.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Simulium ( Freemanellum )
is distributed in the following countries of the Afrotropical Region: Cameroon , Democratic Republic of Congo , Ghana , Guinea , Ivory Coast , Liberia , Malawi , Nigeria , Sierra Leone , South Africa , Tanzania , Togo , Uganda , and Zimbabwe .
